dict.acceptation: 职业，专业；同行；宣称；信念，信仰；

sent.orig: A profession is an occupation which requires higher education and specific training.
sent.trans: profession指需要受过较高深教育和专门训练才能从事的职业。

sent.orig: First, this purchase needs from the entire drink profession consideration from the fruit juice profession consideration?
sent.trans: 一是这次收购需要从整个饮料行业考虑还是从果汁行业考虑？

sent.orig: At present in China, the furniture profession enters the threshold low profession.
sent.trans: 目前在中国，家具行业还是进入门槛低的行业。

sent.orig: The real estate profession's adjustment will also continue, maintenance profession neutral rating.
sent.trans: 房地产行业的调整还将持续，维持行业中性评级。

sent.orig: Real property management is a novel profession in China. Meanwhile, also a very complicated, comprehensive profession.
sent.trans: 物业管理在我国是一个新兴行业，而从物业管理行业本身来讲，又是一个极其复杂的综合性行业。
